Translations.Text: dir Ni kred en DI en ki send us en ki send down Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs en ki don Moses Jesus prophets their Lord Ni ne far distinction any da them. Al Him sol ni est submitters
Anyone akcept Submission his religi gxi ne akcept him Hereafter li est losers
Why DI direkt popol should disbelieved post kred post witnessing messenger est truth kaj solid proofs don them? DI NE DIREKT DES wicked
These incurred condemnation DI angxel all popol
Eternally ili abide therein; retribution neniam commuted them nor vol ili reprieved
Exempted est those who pent thereafter reform DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those disbelieve kred tiam plongx profund disbelief their repentance ne akcept them; ili est efektiv strayers
Those disbelieve mort disbelievers earthful or vol ne akcept any da them eben such ransom est possible Ili incurred painful retribution; ili ne hav helpers
